channel.title: CVE Feed for vittor1o -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vittor1o -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9586|2024-10-11T05:33:12.640Z -- vittor1o -- linkz.ai%20%E2%80%93%20automatic%20link%20previews%20on%20hover
item.description: The Linkz.ai plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'check_auth' and 'check_logout' functions in versions up to, and including, 1.1.8. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-9587|2024-10-11T05:33:12.113Z -- vittor1o -- linkz.ai%20%E2%80%93%20automatic%20link%20previews%20on%20hover
item.description: The Linkz.ai plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'ajax_linkz' function in versions up to, and including, 1.1.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level privileges or above, to update plugin settings.
